ygData.subject: Re: weapon ideas?
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed, dueal weilding 2 minos was great for damage when i used them.  but i wore out quickly (due to the weight).  Now when I duel weild, I use a barbed
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed, dueal weilding 2 minos was great for damage when i used them. but i
wore out quickly (due to the weight). Now when I duel weild, I use a barbed
leather whip and a combine long sword. The whip is primary and I hit fast
and harder with it than i do my ls. I also (was late in training it) have a
SBH which i use whenever I can just to get the skill up. 2hs against blues
and whites when in a good group, and duel weild against the harder to hit,
higher level creatures.

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tom Swift [mailto:tswift@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 12:51 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] weapon ideas?
>
>
> From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>
> You missed the recent discussion on that very topic.
>
> Keep your 2 hander for dealing with blue creatures....keep your skill up.
> As far as 1hs, use the longsword in your primary slot and the mino in your
> secondary. There may be a case for getting 2 swords for speed. I am not
> sure you are getting the most out of dual wield with one fast and one slow
> weapon.
>
> My current combo is primary: tentacle whip secondary: combine
> scimitar. My
> friends call me Ginsu :)
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: bloodore guts <bloodore@...>
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 2:39 PM
> Subject: [warriors_eq] weapon ideas?
>
>
> >From: "bloodore guts" <bloodore@...>
> >
> >hey there..
> > I just got dual weild. I am thinking of changing from a FS two-handed
> sword to two 1H/weapons. Do you think that a magic combine long
> sword and a
> mino axe would make a good combination? Which one should I use as
> a primary
> weapon? Any ideas or suggestions would be helpful! Thanks in advance!
